price: (67) Uff[894] to you and to what you worship instead of Allāh. Then will you not use reason?"
arabic: أُفّٖ لَّكُمۡ وَلِمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ
footnotes: [894]- An exclamation of anger and displeasure.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: uffin lakum walimā taʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi afalā taʿqilūna
